Flossing: I would brush my teeth regularly and floss every day to remove any food particles and plaque buildup. I would also use mouthwash to kill bacteria and freshen my breath.
Electric Toothbrush: I would invest in an electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes to ensure and brushing.
Homemade Toothpaste: I would make my own toothpaste using natural ingredients like baking soda, coconut oil, and essential oils.
Dental Checkups: I would schedule regular dental checkups with my dentist, even if there were no more dentists available.
Natural Remedies: I would use natural remedies like oil pulling and tongue scraping to maintain good oral hygiene and prevent cavities.
